game.name: DudeGo
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Each map is different and has a challenge for you. Are you ready to conquer the unexpected? Prove that you can handle every challenge the game has to offer. Last survivor is the winner. will it be you?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Each map is different and has a challenge for you. Are you ready to conquer the unexpected? Prove that you can handle every challenge the game has to offer. Last survivor is the winner. will it be you?
